item.description:
Henry and I are going to do another trip out to Blue Hills Reservation on Saturday, November 6, 2010.
We'll try to head-out around 11:30am, and we'll a combination of trails on the East-Side of Rt 28.


Total Hike Time (Est): 3-4 Hours; Approx 4-5 miles
Difficulty: Easy-to-Moderate
Trail(s): Red-Dot (Braintree Pass, Bouncing Brook Path, etc), Blue Flag (Skyline Trail), and connectors, etc..

I will be parking at the Parking Area at the corner of Rt 28 and Chickatawbut Rd.
*In the event that the parking area is closed or full, I will be parking at the Parking Area south of Chickatawbut Rd on Rt. 28 (approx. 0.3mi).

Contact#: 501.472.4491

Weather Conditions:
Saturday, Nov 6
High 55, Low 36
Precip: 20%
Wind: SW @11mph
Humidity: 71%
Cloudy. A chance of showers in the morning. Highs around 50. Chance of rain 20 percent.
item.name: Blue Hills Reservation Dog Hike
